summary: Comprehensive testing of Dynamic Permissions Management System completed successfully. Backend achieved 100% success rate (14/14 tests). Frontend E2E testing verified all major features including tab navigation, Scanner button, checkbox toggling, and save functionality.
passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/permissions/scan - Successfully generates 66 permissions across 11 modules
Backend: GET /api/permissions/structure - Returns correct module structure with permissions grouped
Backend: GET /api/permissions/roles - Returns all 4 roles (super_admin, admin, secretary, employee)
Backend: GET /api/permissions/roles/super_admin - Contains wildcard (*) permission
Backend: GET /api/permissions/roles/admin - Contains 62 detailed permissions
Backend: GET /api/permissions/roles/secretary - Contains restricted permissions (no approve_leave)
Backend: GET /api/permissions/roles/employee - Contains limited permissions (14)
Backend: GET /api/permissions/roles/{nonexistent} - Returns 404 correctly
Backend: PUT /api/permissions/roles/{role_name} - Successfully updates role permissions
Backend: GET /api/permissions - Lists all permissions from catalog
Backend: Unauthorized access correctly rejected (401/403)
Backend: Empty permissions update works correctly
Frontend: Permissions page loads correctly at /permissions
Frontend: Stats cards show permissions count per role (Super Admin: 1, Admin: 62, Secretary: 32-33, Employee: 14)
Frontend: Tab navigation works (Super Administrateur, Administrateur, Secrétaire, Employé)
Frontend: Permissions grouped by module with badge counts (e.g., 2/2, 4/8, 7/9)
Frontend: Scanner button works and shows success toast with count
Frontend: Checkbox toggle changes permission state
Frontend: 'Modifications non sauvegardées' banner appears after changes
Frontend: Sauvegarder button saves changes and shows success toast
Frontend: Module counts update after permission changes
Frontend: Super admin tab shows 'Accès complet à toutes les fonctionnalités' description
E2E: Complete flow - toggle permission -> unsaved banner -> save -> success toast
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing admin user
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dynamic Permissions System fully implemented and tested. Backend stores permissions in 'permissions_catalog' collection and roles in 'roles' collection. Frontend uses React Tabs for role navigation and shadcn Checkbox components. Super admin role has wildcard (*) permission. All 11 modules tested: dashboard, communication, gestion_personnel, conges, comportement, documents, sites, departements, notifications, permissions, parametres.
